greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Two 2's followed by all 1's.
comment: Essentially the same as the "all ones" sequence A000012. - _M. F. Hasler_, May 30 2020
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1).
formula: a(n) = H_n(1, 1), where H_n is the n-th hyperoperator (cf. A054871). - _Natan Arie Consigli_, Feb 26 2015
a(n) = A000012(n) for all n > 1. - _M. F. Hasler_, May 30 2020
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Jul 31 2008
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 03 2010
